name: Melon
description: Melons are a group of species in the Cucurbitaceae family. They produce sweet fruits that grow on sprawling vines. Types of melons include: watermelons, cantaloupe, honeydew, casaba, and crenshaw. More growing information is available in individual species entries.
sowing_method: Direct seed. If planting indoors, use peat pots and harden off before transplanting seedlings outside.
